name: Open-Faced Hot Roast Beef Sandwich
author: ebrunworth
summary: This delicious hot sandwich can be made with either left over roast beef or, in a pinch, with deli roast beef.
directions: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source
Stir the sauerkraut, mustard, barbeque sauce, and hot pepper sauce in a microwave safe bowl
Cook in the microwave on high until slightly bubbly and thickened, about 3 minutes
Meanwhile, place the bread onto a baking sheet, and top with the roast beef and sauerkraut sauce
Place a slice of cheese over each sandwich
Broil in the preheated oven until the edges of the bread are slightly blackened, and the cheese is bubbly, about 3 minutes
